strength_details: IBM is a stable, established enterprise company with global presence
Clear role definition focused on BI/reporting with specific tool requirements
3+ years experience requirement provides clear seniority expectations
concern_details: No salary, benefits, or compensation information disclosed
No career growth, advancement, or learning opportunities mentioned
Focus on traditional BI tools (Cognos) rather than modern data engineering stack
No reporting structure, team composition, or management hierarchy information
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers (3-5 years) with BI/reporting experience
Professionals with Cognos experience seeking stable enterprise role
Candidates prioritizing company stability over rapid growth or modern tech
probe_details: Ask about salary range, benefits, and total compensation package
Understand team structure, reporting lines, and management hierarchy
Clarify career progression opportunities and skill development paths
Learn about the tech stack evolution and modernization plans
leverage_details: Cognos expertise is specific and valuable for this BI-focused role
Being located in Pune, India eliminates relocation concerns
summary.overall_assessment: Stable enterprise role at IBM focused on traditional BI/reporting work. Good for professionals seeking established company environment with clear responsibilities. However, lacks modern tech stack, growth opportunities, and transparency around compensation and career development.
